scene_description_enriched: A female figure, likely a saint, stands draped in flowing robes and a headdress. She holds a cylindrical lantern in her right hand and her left hand rests on her drapery. Beneath her feet, a serpent or dragon is depicted, its body coiled and its head raised. The background is filled with a starry or speckled pattern, suggesting a celestial or symbolic setting. The scene is framed by architectural elements, including an arch above and a column to the right, suggesting a niche or a portal.
